meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with small daisy-like flowers.
meanings.sent1: The feverfew in the garden has pretty white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted some feverfew in my backyard for its lovely blooms.
meanings.sent3: The feverfew in the field told jokes to the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a field of feverfew in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the feverfew danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A medicinal herb used to treat fevers and headaches.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother brews tea with feverfew to help with headaches.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended feverfew to alleviate my fever symptoms.
meanings.sent3: The feverfew herb played hide-and-seek with the other plants.
meanings.sent4: His soothing words were like a dose of feverfew for her worries.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of feverfew filled the room, calming everyone.
